    public static final int DEFAULT_MESSAGE_SIZE = 2;

    public static final int AM_TYPE = 66;

    public Poll_Request() {
        super(DEFAULT_MESSAGE_SIZE);
        amTypeSet(AM_TYPE);

        super(data_length);

        super(data, base_offset, data_length);
        amTypeSet(AM_TYPE);

        super(msg, base_offset, data_length);
